description:
The dataset contains descriptions for each column of historical campaign finance data available on data.sfgov.org or the Excel exports on the Ethics Commission's Campaign Finance Database at http://nf4.netfile.com/pub2?aid=sfo

Please note -- the column header names on different schedules of Form 460 often match, but sometimes have different meanings.

name: Campaign Finance - Data Key
